    implicit none

    integer :: N, K, A, B, m, i

    read(*,*) N, K

    allocate(S(N))

    read(*, '(A)') S

    ! Process first part (c1 and c3 arrays)

    allocate(c1(N), c3(N))

    c1 = S

    c3 = S

    ! Process c1 array

    logical :: flag

    integer :: count

    flag = .false. count =0

    do i =1, N

        if (flag .and. c1(i) == 'R') then

            flag = .false. count = count +1

            if (count == K) exit

        end if

        if (c1(i) == 'L') then

            flag = .true. c1(i) = 'R'

        end if

    end do

    ! Process c3 array

    flag = .false. count =0

    do i =1, N

        if (flag .and. c3(i) == 'L') then

            flag = .false. count = count +1

            if (count == K) exit

        end if

        if (c3(i) == 'R') then

            flag = .true.

            c3(i) = 'L'

    integer :: sum1, sum3, bef_c1, bef_c3, current_count

    ! For sum1

    sum1 =0

    current_count =1

    bef_c1 = c1(1)

    do i =2, N

        if (c1(i) == bef_c1) then

            current_count = current_count +1

        else

            sum1 = sum1 + current_count -1

            bef_c1 = c1(i)

            current_count =1

        end if

    end do

    sum1 = sum1 + current_count -1

    ! For sum3

    sum3 =0

    current_count =1

    bef_c3 = c3(1)

    do i =2, N

        if (c3(i) == bef_c3) then

            current_count = current_count +1

        else

            sum3 = sum3 + current_count -1

            bef_c3 = c3(i)

            current_count =1

        end if

    end do

    sum3 = sum3 + current_count -1

    ! Compute A as max(sum1, sum3)

    A = max(sum1, sum3)

    ! Compute B

    B = (A /3)*2

    if (mod(A,3) /=0) then

        B = B +1

    end if

    ! Process third part with B

    m = B

    write(*, '(I0, A)') B, ' '

    do i = B-1, 1, -1

        if (mod(m, i) ==0) then

            write(*, '(I0, A)') i, ' '

            m = i

        end if

    end do

    deallocate(S, c1, c3)

end program main

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: N, K, A, B, m, i

    character(len=1), dimension(:), allocatable :: S, c1, c3

    ! Read input

    read(*,*) N, K

    allocate(S(N))

    read(*, '(A)') S

    ! Process first part (c1 and c3 arrays)

    allocate(c1(N), c3(N))

    c1 = S

    c3 = S

    ! Process c1 array

    logical :: flag

    integer :: count

    flag = .false.

    count =0

    do i =1, N

        if (flag .and. c1(i) == 'R') then

            flag = .false.

            count = count +1

            if (count == K) exit

        end if

        if (c1(i) == 'L') then

            flag = .true.

            c1(i) = 'R'

        end if

    end do

    ! Process c3 array

    flag = .false.

    count =0

    do i =1, N

        if (flag .and. c3(i) == 'L') then

            flag = .false.

            count = count +1

            if (count == K) exit

        end if

        if (c3(i) == 'R') then

            flag = .true.

            c3(i) = 'L'

        end if

    end do

    ! Compute sum1 and sum3

    integer :: sum1, sum3, bef_c1, bef_c3, current_count

    ! For sum1

    sum1 =0

    current_count =1

    bef_c1 = c1(1)

    do i =2, N

        if (c1(i) == bef_c1) then

            current_count = current_count +1

        else

            sum1 = sum1 + current_count -1

            bef_c1 = c1(i)

            current_count =1

        end if

    end do

    sum1 = sum1 + current_count -1

    ! For sum3

    sum3 =0

    current_count =1

    bef_c3 = c3(1)

    do i =2, N

        if (c3(i) == bef_c3) then

            current_count = current_count +1

        else

            sum3 = sum3 + current_count -1

            bef_c3 = c3(i)

            current_count =1

        end if

    end do

    sum3 = sum3 + current_count -1

    ! Compute A as max(sum1, sum3)

    A = max(sum1, sum3)

    ! Compute B

    B = (A /3)*2

    if (mod(A,3) /=0) then

        B = B +1

    end if

    ! Process third part with B

    m = B

    write(*, '(I0, A)') B, ' '

    do i = B-1, 1, -1

        if (mod(m, i) ==0) then

            write(*, '(I0, A)') i, ' '

            m = i

        end if

    end do

    deallocate(S, c1, c3)

end program main
